What if AI could do this work for them?

What is Triagent?

AI That Understands Your Team

One AI assistant that knows YOUR team's context, with tailored skills for every persona, that acts on your behalf — not just chat

Team Context Aware

Understands your team's processes, ADO structure, coding standards, and workflows

Tool Integration

Connects with ADO, Azure, Databricks, Kusto, Git — read AND write

Autonomous Actions

Creates PRs, updates work items, generates reports — with your permission

Knowledge Search

Find experts, search wikis & ADO, understand team structure, contributions — guide to the right person

Why Claude?

What Sets Triagent Apart

Capability Internal AI Tools (PAL, Sidekick, GPT-4o) Triagent (Claude)
Can Execute Actions ✗ Chat only — provides suggestions but user must copy/paste and run manually ✓ Full autonomy — creates PRs, updates ADO, runs CLI commands with permission controls
Knows Your Team ✗ Generic — no team-specific knowledge of your ADO, standards, or workflows ✓ Deep integration — loads team-specific skills and context, understands repos, wiki, and processes
Has Compute Sandbox ✗ No sandbox — cannot run code, execute scripts, or access file systems ✓ Azure Container Apps — isolated container with Git, Azure CLI, Python, .NET
Multi-Agent Skills ✗ Single model — one conversation, cannot delegate or coordinate subtasks ✓ Specialized subagents — PR-reviewer, telemetry-investigator work in parallel
Deep Research ✗ Limited context — cannot explore codebases, read documentation, or synthesize findings ✓ Extended thinking — multi-step research across repos, wikis, and web with comprehensive analysis

Our Products

Triagent CLI

Command-line interface for technical users comfortable with terminal - runs locally with full file system access, Git integration, and direct tool execution to interact with local system files

Local Execution Full Access Developer-First

Triagent Web

Browser-based interface for all personas - secure sandboxed execution, team authentication, no local setup required

Cloud Sandbox Zero Setup Enterprise Ready

Web Platform Advantages

Sub-Second Sandbox

Azure Container Apps with instant availability

Enterprise Scale

1000s of concurrent users, global deployment

Centralized Costs

Single AI Foundry API, per-team billing options

Skills Marketplace

Share skills across teams and organizations

Value: Developers

Automated PR Reviews

  • Review against team guidelines
  • Check design compliance
  • Validate acceptance criteria
  • Generate comprehensive reports

Build Failure Investigation

  • Analyze pipeline failures
  • Identify root causes
  • Suggest fixes
  • Create PRs with solutions

Telemetry Analysis

  • Investigate errors in logs
  • Query Application Insights
  • Trace exceptions
  • Automate fix creation

All acting on-behalf-of the user - review, investigate, fix, and create PRs autonomously

Value: Support Teams

Workflow Understanding

Understands the support process set by each team and follows established procedures

LSI Ticket Creation

Automatically creates LSI tickets with proper categorization and details

Backlog Recommendations

Suggests fixes and creates backlog items for the development team

End-to-End Triage

Complete investigation with detailed analysis

Hours → Minutes

Time saved per investigation
